# Windstorm (Domain)

**Granted Powers:** Inclement weather has less of an effect on you. Rain and snow donâ€™t penalize your [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] (3.5 Spot and Search) checks. You can move through snow-covered and icy terrain at your normal movement. Wind effects, whether natural or magical, affect you as if you were one size category larger.

**Windstorm Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Obscuring Mist (Spell)|Obscuring Mist]]****:** Fog surrounds you.

**2** **[[Binding Winds (Spell)|Binding Winds]]****:** Air prevents subject from moving, hinders ranged attacks.

**3** **[[Call Lightning (Spell)|Call Lightning]]****:** Calls down lightning bolts (3d6 per bolt) from sky.

**4** **[[Ice Storm (Spell)|Ice Storm]]****:** Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.

**5** **[[Arc of Lightning (Spell)|Arc of Lightning]]****:** Line of electricity arcs between two creatures (1d6/level damage).

**6 [[Cloudwalkers (Spell)|Cloudwalkers]]:** Subjects can fly outdoors at speed of 60 ft.

**7** **[[Control Weather (Spell)|Control Weather]]****:** Changes weather in local area.

**8** **[[Whirlwind (Spell)|Whirlwind]]****:** Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.

**9 [[Whirlwind, Greater (Spell)|Whirlwind, Greater]]:** As *[[Whirlwind (Spell)|whirlwind]]*, but larger and more destructive.
